channel.title: Any ideas how to fix this?
channel.description:
i have the cache in my C: drive ?
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/rk25bt.jpg[/img]

item.title: Any ideas how to fix this?
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Check the maps folder in the cache and see if there’s a file called “mapConfig.txt”. Then either rename the .txt file to mapConfig or change the path name in one of your client files that tries to find mapConfig.txt to what it should be.

Or your cache is named wrong. You know the error gives the clue where to look, self explanatory really.

Read full topic
item.source: Any ideas how to fix this?
